title: Real Recorded Gun & Bullet Sounds - Gun Sounds
description: 494 Real Recorded Gun & Bullet SFX That Will Take Your Game To The Next Level!
longDescription:
> LISTEN HERE <

> View The Complete File List (494 Sounds) <

**Limited Time: Add $10 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (9000+ Sounds)**


*Updated! In preparation for unreal engine 5 we made sure that all sounds are 100% ready (Remixed and Re-Edited) for any game that you might be working on!


In our most ambitious library yet, you will find 494 lightly processed recordings to give you the most realistic sound possible!


In this pack you will find various different guns and bullet (impacts, flybys, casing, falling etc..) sounds + Bonus bandage sounds.


Each gun comes with single shot, suppressed shot, coking, draw, mag in, mag out, holster and other different weapon specific sounds for each weapon found in this pack.


The pack Includes the following weapons (Some guns go by generic names due to copyright issues):

  • M4A4
  • M16
  • AK-47
  • Submachine Guns
  • Assault Rifles
  • Snipers
  • Shotguns
  • Pistols
  • Revolver
  • Flare Gun
  • Bonus: Bandage Sounds


Contact Us:

Support | Discord
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Recorded using a professional setup designed to record gun sounds
  •  Each Gun comes with all the different sounds you might need including a mag in and out to add to your animations
  •  Free future updates


Number of Audio Waves: 494

Number of Audio Cues: 494

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Minutes of audio provided: 3
